allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete backend refactor with Supabase integration

- Add Supabase database for persistent job/product storage
- Add background task processing \(non-blocking scraping\)
- Add image upload to Supabase Storage
- Add scraping module with Amazon, Wayfair, Generic scrapers
- Add webdriver-manager for automatic ChromeDriver download
- Add test script for debugging \(test_scrape.py\)
- Add comprehensive README documentation
- Remove deprecated files and clean up structure

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add React frontend with product management dashboard

- Create React + Vite + Tailwind CSS frontend
- Add ScrapeForm component with progress tracking
- Add ProductList with view/delete actions
- Add ProductCard with edit, image management, and delete
- Add CORS middleware to FastAPI backend
- Add /api/ prefix to all endpoints for consistency
- Add PATCH /api/products/{id} for editing product fields
- Add GET/DELETE endpoints for product images
- Add UpdateProductRequest model

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
